item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Pretty much every link other than the two scratchy ones, plus the "other" section is broken, cause they were all hosted on one guy's bvs site (which apparently is no more). I understand if there's additional links now for the tools, but someone in-the-know might want to update the linksâ€¦

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: there's already one for the item checker and it's more recent than the one the Lafiel had posted here. go to the official BvS forums and look for it under resources.

item.title: Broken
item.content:encoded: The Item and upgrade checkers are broken links, they are no longer hosted where they say they are. We need to contact Lafiel and get them hosted someplace else, I figure someone could make a Greassmonkey script for them.
